ygData.subject: Re: Welcome to EQ_women@onelist.com
ygData.msgSnippet: DON T DO IT!!! The game is totally addictive and will take over your life!  Other than that, it s great.  The monthly cost is $10 unless you decide to sign up
ygData.messageBody:
DON'T DO IT!!!

The game is totally addictive and will take over your life! Other than
that, it's great. The monthly cost is $10 unless you decide to sign up
for 6 mos. at a time in which case it is $9.

Judy, currently playing Dnaisha on Brell Serilis

Brangvyne@... wrote:

> In a message dated 10/29/1999 11:44:57 PM Central Daylight Time,
> EQ_women-owner@onelist.com writes:
>
> << Hi there, and welcome to EQ Women! This mailing list is for women
> who
> play the game Everquest to meet eachother and chat.
>
> You can post to the list by replying to this message,
> or by emailing "EQ_women@onelist.com". >>
>
> Salutations!
> I am sorry to come on here but I have a question.
> I am about to buy this game and I wanted to get some opinion from some
> of you
> who are in it about it and how good it is and whether it is worth the
> cost.
> I was also curious if someone could tell me what the cost is, after
> the
> initial expense of buying the game. The game at the local Best Buy
> does not
> give the monthly charge on it at all.
> I have never been in an online game before so this will be a first.
> Please feel free to contact me at Brangvyne@... if you can answer
> any of
> these questions.
> And don't worry, I wont clutter your list up with any other posts
> until I'm
> officially a member of the game.
> :o)
> Brangvyne
>

> Click Here
